content.question: Which of the following implementations of doSomething will allow this code segment to run without error when added to the Widget class?

choices.label: public static int doSomething() { return number; }
public static int doSomething() { return word.length(); }

content.answer: public static int doSomething() { return word.length(); }

skill.text: 2.C: Write program code involving procedural abstractions.
